page.title: 15ASHPERTON - PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: The Box Bush and Hopton Arms use Whitbread Flowers as a brewery. The most popular beers for the Box Bush are pale ale and bitter beer but for the Hopton Arms it is Flowers. The opening times are nearly the same except that the Box Bush opens from 10.00-2.30 and the Hopton Arms opens from 10.30-2.00. The Box Bush doesn't supply bar food but the Hopton Arms does. The people who own the Box Bush have been there for 60 years and the people who own the Hopton Arms have been there for 3\ years. The people who own the Hopton Arms came from Knighton. At the Hopton Arms they are converting the stables into a changing room for the football team. The Box Bush does not cater for families but the Hopton does. The Hopton Arms has a field which can accomodate 30 - 40 caravans and tents.
